channel.title: Specials Development
channel.description: Well me and dan have been coding things for my serv, MooseVille, one of those is special. We managed to get double hitter dds, gmaul fast, and d mace working, (dan) and i got the refills + provided FULLY working spec bar. What i need is a bit of help with making custom specials, for example, Dark bow special? Making both hits ALWAYS hit with 50+ more power? To see what we have so far check this out. [size=30pt][url=http://youtube.com/watch?v=ziKD7IMLqMs]WATCH TEH SHOW OFF VID[/url]

item.title: Specials Development
item.dc:creator: @emo_pixel emo pixel
item.description:
@emo_pixel wrote:

Well me and dan have been coding things for my serv, MooseVille, one of those is special. We managed to get double hitter dds, gmaul fast, and d mace working, (dan) and i got the refills + provided FULLY working spec bar. What i need is a bit of help with making custom specials, for example, Dark bow special? Making both hits ALWAYS hit with 50+ more power? To see what we have so far check this out.
[size=30pt]WATCH TEH SHOW OFF VID
